name: places/ChIJX0c0JPBZwokRDp1HtP0hwUA
formattedAddress: @ The Max, 606 W 57th St Level C2, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: @ The Max, 606 W 57th St Level C2, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: I have been to this place a few times and Sophia is absolutely the best. I have done microneedling and peels with her and my skin has gotten so much better. I highly recommend the microneedling here because Sophia does it really well and it is reasonably priced as well. It's a small place so it might be hard to get in touch with them in the beginning. Once they get to know you, it's much easier to make appointments. You can simply text them to make requests or change your appointments.

text.text: I have been to this place a few times and Sophia is absolutely the best. I have done microneedling and peels with her and my skin has gotten so much better. I highly recommend the microneedling here because Sophia does it really well and it is reasonably priced as well. It's a small place so it might be hard to get in touch with them in the beginning. Once they get to know you, it's much easier to make appointments. You can simply text them to make requests or change your appointments.

originalText.text: Sophia is an exceptional massage therapist! Her skilled hands and soothing techniques create a truly rejuvenating experience. I highly recommend her for anyone seeking relaxation and relief. Five stars!

text.text: Sophia is an exceptional massage therapist! Her skilled hands and soothing techniques create a truly rejuvenating experience. I highly recommend her for anyone seeking relaxation and relief. Five stars!

originalText.text:
Update 3: I heard they are closing

Update2:
Tried both message therapists, I guess Luis is more for treating a certain pain and Sophia is more for whole body relax. You can choose depending on what you need. But heard they are changing owner, not sure how it would be in the future.

Update:
Had two sessions with Luis, he is professional and gentle. He doesn’t talk much but do ask about your needs. Feel more respect with him so decide to continue with him. And he always makes sure to give you a full hour massage instead of trying to make it 50 mins or so.

—- first review

Tried the 1st massage with Sophia, and she was not bad. I'm not sure why others say she talks too much. Personally, I feel it’s okay. She is just asking about your situation and tries to understand what you need. But there was one time it got a little awkward. I didn’t pronounce 'shoulders' correctly when talking to her, and she laughed and repeated my pronunciation multiple times... well... I said sorry. I hope she would recognize that non-native speakers would have these issues, though. Everything else was okay. She didn’t leave during the session like others mentioned in the comments. So overall, not bad. Will try another massage therapist next week and come back to update my review.

The owner does not pick up the phone but will reply to messages promptly. At least during Friday night, the reply was fast.

originalText.text: Sophia is the best aesthetician on the planet.  She is friendly, kind and works with you on your skin care needs.  I have come to her multiple times for facials, micro needling treatments and my skin has never looked better.  I recommend Sophia 100% and will go to no one else for my skin care needs and treatments.

text.text: Sophia is the best aesthetician on the planet.  She is friendly, kind and works with you on your skin care needs.  I have come to her multiple times for facials, micro needling treatments and my skin has never looked better.  I recommend Sophia 100% and will go to no one else for my skin care needs and treatments.

originalText.text:
Sophia was awesome
Went for a 60 minute massage. As I am not a frequent user of massages as it usually makes me a little uncomfortable Sophia did such a great job I was hoping for more. Sophia left me feeling completely de-stressed
